channel.title: Help With Shop Items?
channel.description:
:confused: :confused: Im Kinda New To PS But I Know A Enough To Get Me By....I need help with changing items in my shops....i have a few sources, and i need a little help with adding more npc's with action "eg: shops, free stuff" like giving it to players of a certion lvl. any help will be great Thanks!!!!
~Shasta

item.title: Help With Shop Items?
item.dc:creator: @public_void_mscpidio public void mscpidiots()
item.description:
@public_void_mscpidio wrote:

[quote=“Rs Classic”]Are you trying to do Rsc Or Rs2…
Im pretty sure your doing Rsc so here it goes,
To add items in the shop go to the shopdef.xml just search the npc id and under it, it will have the items in there just put the same code with a different item id and you will have another item in the shop when your done just compress it into a gz file then compile.[/quote]He’s obviously doing rs2 if he doesn’t know what section to post in and he said “multiple sources” which likely means rs2 because most of the rsc source shops are the same.

Read full topic

item.description:
@system wrote:

sorry about that, where does it go?
